thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Brooklyn Man Targeted Cops with Deadly Package Explosive, Police Say

author: Zolan Kanno-Youngs
title: Brooklyn Man Targeted Cops with Deadly Package Explosive, Police Say
text:
Police arrested a Brooklyn man on Wednesday for allegedly trying to get revenge on a police officer last summer by planting on a Queens porch a packaged explosive that detonated and killed an unsuspecting owner of the building.
Federal agents and the New York Police Department arrested Victor Kingsley, 37 years old, at his East Flatbush home for planting the package in the Brookville neighborhood of Queens, police said. On July 28, George Wray, the 73-year-old owner of the building, opened the package, causing it to explode...
